content: I’ve resigned myself to the reality that “don’t go to college” headlines make excellent click bait. As a consequence, I realize they won’t stop no matter how much I wish they would. So, instead of devoting time to explaining why such postings are almost always misguided, short-sighted and dangerously misleading, I’ll simply point out that you can accomplish every single skill described in this post (wait for it) . . . in college.
